channel.title: Lost old account
channel.description: Hey I lost my old moparscape account (there was some kind of site wide password reset or something if I remember right), it was liked with my old email and was ISP based that I no longer have access to (I moved since the account's creation). Who can I contact to get the account back? I can provide proof I am the account owner (I know the old password, have emails archived, have an IP in the same general area (different city but probably about a 30 minute-45 minute drive from where I lived previously), etc).

item.title: Lost old account
item.dc:creator: @Daginith Daginith
item.description:
@Daginith wrote:

just wondering…what was your old acc’s name?

Read full topic

legendzpk:

Hey I lost my old moparscape account (there was some kind of site wide password reset or something if I remember right), it was liked with my old email and was ISP based that I no longer have access to (I moved since the account’s creation). PM a Administrator or Moderator. They’ll help you out.
